none: Angliae, Scotiae, et Hiberniae, sive Britannicar: Insularum Descriptio
Angliae, Scotiae, et Hiberniae, sive Britannicarum Insularum Descriptio

Scale approximately 1:2,880,000. 50 Miliaria Anglica = 3.3 cm--(W 10°43'00"--E 2°11'00"/N 59°21'00"--N 48°20'00")  ; Cum privilegio. ; Relief shown pictorially. ; From: Ortelius, Theatrum Orbis Terrarum, 1595. ; Scale in "miliaria Anglica" at bottom center. ; On verso: Latin text ;  p 10. ; North is to the right side of the map. ; Decorations include ships and the coat of arms of John of Gaunt.
